entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Goderich
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:18 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Goderich 11:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -8.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -19
Dewpoint: -10.0°C
Wind: WSW 46 km/h gust 65 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Blizzard. Temperature falling to minus 10 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Local snowfall amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70 increasing to 60 gusting to 100 early this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 10 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:09 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
